question: What sized character n-grams do they use?
What results do their embeddings obtain on machine translation?
ground_truth: BLEU score of 35.48 on En-Fr, 23.27 on En-De, 34.43 on Fr-En, 28.86 on De-En

question: How do they combine ordinary word embeddings and ones constructed from character n-grams?
ground_truth: They use a sum of charn-MS-vec and the standard word embedding as an input of an RNN
